caption: The video shows the daily routine of an unfortunate man. A first, when he came to the office, his colleague found him and started to talk with him. However, the conversation is not very friendly, and they have conflicts over several issues. After that, the man was upset and went back to his car, drinking alcohol. However, he was again discovered by two policemen. Police officers thought he was drunk driving and put him to prison. He didnâ€™t get out until his friends came to help him and explained all the misunderstanding.
